# First level header {-}

I want eveyone to see my histogram in Figure \@ref(fig:FG).

```{r}
library(PASWR2)
```

## Create proper data set {-}

```{r}
library(dplyr)
flys <- DROSOPHILA %>%
  filter(line != "Susceptible")
DT::datatable(flys)
```

## Graph with caption {-}

```{r, label = "FG", fig.cap = "This is where you type your description"}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(data = flys, aes(x = fecundity)) +
  geom_histogram(fill = "pink", color = "black", binwidth = 5) +
  theme_bw() + 
  labs(x = "Number of eggs laid over a 25 day period")
```
